ISSUE.TITLE: Commitstore.KillCommits is causing an init-time panic
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: This is a vanilla DigitalOcean Ubuntu 14.04 + Docker 1.2 droplet (1gb) ``` ciarand@drone:~$ sudo tail /var/log/upstart/drone.log goroutine 17 [syscall]: runtime.goexit() /usr/local/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:1445 goroutine 25 [runnable]: github.com/drone/drone/server/datastore/database.(*Commitstore).KillCommits(0xc208036cb0, 0xc208050a80, 0xc208036cb0) /var/cache/drone/src/github.com/drone/drone/server/datastore/database/commit.go:75 created by main.main /var/cache/drone/src/github.com/drone/drone/server/main.go:103 +0x27e ``` Any idea?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Align UI with design and feedback per bugbash (#541)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Rename Permissions to Members / SplitButton popover width / Privacy ToS links / PR title long (#548)
